events.message: The candidate submitted their application for the software engineer role, showcasing strong backend development skills.
Application has been categorized under Engineering as the candidate has relevant experience in DevOps and software development.
Recruiter assigned to the candidate to coordinate further steps and ensure smooth communication throughout the hiring process.
Initial screening call completed where the candidate demonstrated solid understanding of software engineering principles and problem-solving skills.
Candidate responded promptly agreeing to proceed with the technical interview and expressing enthusiasm about the position.
Technical interview scheduled for next week, focusing on coding challenges and system design relevant to the development role.
